name: bj-sbf3
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0
body: |- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s1, w0))
-| wnf(s1, wex(s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s1, w0))
-| wnf(s1, wex(s1, w0))
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s1, w0))

comment: Substitution has no effect on a bound variable (existential quantifier case); see ~ sbf2 . (Contributed by BJ, 2-May-2019.)
